sentences.en: Among those remaining, she says, some have taken on second jobs in retail and construction to bolster their incomes.
sentences.cn: 她说，在这些剩下的人当中，有些人已在零售和建筑业中从事第二职业，以提高收入。

sentences.en: Half of all transaction deposits do not appear in M1 [the money supply ] due to retail deposit sweeping.
sentences.cn: 因为零售储蓄的膨胀，所有交易的存款有一半未出现在M1中（货币供应）。

sentences.en: He buys at wholesale and sells at retail.
sentences.cn: 他趸批零售.

sentences.en: He buys wholesale and sells retail.
sentences.cn: 他整买零卖.

sentences.en: He does wholesale business, while his brother is engaged in retail business.
sentences.cn: 他经营批发生意, 他弟弟则经营零售生意.

sentences.en: He now controls the largest retail development empire in southern California.
sentences.cn: 他现在掌管着加州南部最大的零售发展企业。

sentences.en: In this shop they retail tobacco and sweets.
sentences.cn: 这家铺子零售香烟和糖果.

sentences.en: Record profits in the retail market indicate a boom in the economy.
sentences.cn: 零售市场上有史以来的最高利润显示出经济的突飞猛进。

sentences.en: Retail business slacks down when employment drops.
sentences.cn: 就业率低时零售业就不景气.

sentences.en: Retail sales fell by 1.3% in January.
sentences.cn: 1月份零售额下降了1.3%。

sentences.en: Savings schemes are the best retail investment products on offer.
sentences.cn: 储蓄方案是现有的最佳零售投资产品。

sentences.en: Shopkeepers buy wholesale and sell retail.
sentences.cn: 小店主整批买进再零售出去.

sentences.en: The latest straw in the wind is a pick-up in sales among the nation's retail giants.
sentences.cn: 最新的迹象是该国几家零售巨头的销售额有所上升。

sentences.en: The news from Body Shop rattled the rest of the retail sector.
sentences.cn: 从“美体小铺”传来的消息令整个零售行业不安。

sentences.en: The retail value would be around $500.
sentences.cn: 零售价在500美元左右。

sentences.en: The wine retails at £6.95 a bottle.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒每瓶的零售价为6.95英镑。

sentences.en: Their products are retailed all over Britain.
sentences.cn: 他们的产品在英国各地都有零售。

sentences.en: These shoes retail at 10 yuan a pair.
sentences.cn: 这些鞋子零卖10元一双.

sentences.en: These shoes retail for [ at ] ＄10 a pair.
sentences.cn: 这种鞋子 零卖 10美元一双.

sentences.en: They have tried to reinvent their retail stores.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在尝试改造他们的零售店。

sentences.en: They sell wholesale, not retail.
sentences.cn: 他们批发而不零售。

sentences.en: Unemployment is rising again and retail buying has fallen off.
sentences.cn: 失业率再次上升，零售品购买量下降。
